articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: ‘Helldivers 2’ Patch Notes: Charger, Bile Titan Nerfs Incoming - Forbes
articles.description: Helldivers 2’s new 1.000.102 patch is addressing Bile Titans and Chargers, which have gotten out of hand on higher difficulties.
articles.content:
Bile Titans
Arrowhead
At a certain point, it all just becomes too much. Helldivers 2 can spawn so many heavily armored enemies that its almost impossible to deal with. Sometimes chaotic fun, other … [+2626 chars]
